class DataSet:
    def __init__(self, engine, source):
        self.engine = engine
        self.source = source

    def set_timebounds(self, start, end):
        pass

    def set_spacebounds(self, bbox, grid_file, matching_fn):
        pass

    def discover_tiles():
        pass

    def sync():
        pass

    def stitch():
        pass

class Tile:
    def __init__(self, remote_path):
        self.remote_path = remote_path
        self.size = size

    def discover_tile():
        pass
